website_summaries.verdict: This easy-to-apply product is a solid choice for those wanting to save time and money on a bubble mask.
pros: Free of parabens, sulfates, or alcohol
Many customers report that face felt firmer after using this product
cons: Thin sheets can be hard for some to apply

customer_reviews.title: Super Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I love sheet masks , like LOVE they are my addiction. I’m in the beauty industry so sheet masks are apart of my daily conversations. I’ve like masks from Ebanel before even bought to give to clients for a DIY Spa Day with the Deep Conditioner I sold them . But this mask was STIFF . It hardly contoured my face like they normally do . I was super duper disappointed. I won’t be buying these anytime soon . Sorry Ebanel
customer_reviews.author: kimme

customer_reviews.title: This product is NOT for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I got reaction after few minutes and my face skin got itchy and red. I think this is not for sensitive skin type.
customer_reviews.author: AmaGuess

customer_reviews.title: My daughter said, “10/10 Recommend!”
customer_reviews.text: Our teenage daughters like doing face masks so I ordered this 10-pack to save money and a trip to the store. She sent this picture with the comment, “10/10 Recommend!” She is a lot prettier than the picture, but it sure is funny! She will kill be if she finds out it is posted!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fun Bubbly Moisturizing Oxygen Masque
customer_reviews.text: A friend gave me an oxygenating masque for Christmas and it felt great! These are good, but don’t give me as much of a tingly feeling. The masque is also very moist and I have to wipe my face quite a bit. It also sticks to itself more than regular Korean collagen masques so is a little difficult to put on if you are farsighted or impatient.
customer_reviews.author: WendyF

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenating and refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: Im finding that hyaluronic acid is amazing stuff ! It really gently exfoliates your skin and makes it look and feel smooth. This mask is so invigorating and I love all the bubbles. It smells great and makes my skin look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great Bubble Mask
customer_reviews.text: While its to early to write a view on the long term benefits of bubble masks, I will say that these work just as good any other bubble mask I've purchased. I actually feel the tiny bubbles all over my face and afterward, my skin feels great. I will circle back in a few months and tell you the long term benefits of using these mask.
customer_reviews.author: Ashanti B

customer_reviews.title: gooey mess
customer_reviews.text: The package said to open and take out the mask and unfold it, then put it on your face. HA. There was no way to unfold it. It was a gooey mess. By the time I was done trying, It was full of holes.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo Dideon

customer_reviews.title: Strips your oil, leaves face dry
customer_reviews.text: So I know this mask really cleans your skin. But it strips you from your natural oils so it leaves your face really dry. I just put a moisturizing mask after it. I think I’ll use these mask once a month until I’m done with them. I Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppingislife

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many face bubble masks before but this one is my favorite. It makes my face smooth and bright after 1 use. It also clear my black head on my nose. I will order more .
customer_reviews.author: Computer_Link_Inc

customer_reviews.title: I Looked Like a Fabulous Werewolf With It On - I love This Mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask so much I made a video about it...with it on!!!
customer_reviews.author: Riche Chienne

customer_reviews.title: Couples! Masks
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot harder to get out of the package and into my face than I expected. I didn't notice much change but the bubbles felt fun and it was very relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Goad

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a charcoal mask that foams up after being on a few minutes. It makes my face look and feel really smooth. I would buy this again from the seller. Product arrived as stated maybe even a day or so earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing I use a couple times a week. Definitely going to buy again
customer_reviews.author: brooke walsh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask and it really works! I feels so refreshing and clean, I will definitely be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Bastian

customer_reviews.title: Wow to the bubbles!
customer_reviews.text: What a refreshing feeling mask! Definitely relax while using it because it carbonates quite a bit. My face felt so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. Dont like them as much as the non bubbling face mask
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Feeling very good to use them ... so gentle ...
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad

customer_reviews.title: Dries out your skin too much
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I bought based on such high reviews but the mask dries out your skin sooooo much ... I have a normal/oily skin. I wish I could return it but missed the return window.
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: This mask is great, after you take it off your skin feels supple.
customer_reviews.text: I like this mask 100%, it is a unique and good for your skin, After you take it off, the face feels very clean and bright. This mask it is for all kind of skins, I have some sensitive areas and didn't harm me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Elena Yada

customer_reviews.title: Great price, skin loving ingredients!!
customer_reviews.text: As a Master Aesetician I was skeptical but I tried on referral from another esty and I love it!! I team it up with some of myvmore advanced exfoliating treatments and it works well!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was designed for all skin condition
customer_reviews.text: It’s an excellent product for oil skin, people with acne, sundamage and for all skin with any special condition. I’ve got a wonderful result with my customer.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Alamo

customer_reviews.title: Bubble Masks
customer_reviews.text: Promoted this oxygenating facial and it was a hit. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Rhonnie Robins

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: was not the best mask i have ever had, over all disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Dryness/Rash/Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I have never had an allergic reaction to a sheet mask before, but this one caused one around my eye area. I tried it multiple times to confirm it was the sheet mask and not an isolated incident.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well and great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value and works well. I did this one followed by a moisturizing one.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Rivera

customer_reviews.title: good product at good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice product at a good price - the bubbling masks feel very nice and usually cost way more
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kadow

customer_reviews.title: Facial mask
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter...she loves it! Can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Messy!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly messy. It got all over my hair and in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used the facial mask 3 times and so far it been one of the better facial products I have bought. Leaves skin feeling great. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard N Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good result
customer_reviews.text: Really good and not expensive at all. Def buying again
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Sanz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The mask is very comfortable on the face and has a strong moisturizing effect
customer_reviews.author: Rew

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It really changes the way ur skin feels and looks. You wake up with great texture the next day !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I used 3 times this mask now,great moisturizing result. My face is softer and firmer, and my eye bags were gone, what a steal, totally recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Strange smell
customer_reviews.text: I love Korean products for cosmetics. I have tried several different masks and know that not all live up to the hype. These seemed a bit off. They have off an ammonia like odor. I didn't find them to be relaxing since I was wondering why they smelled so icky and looked forward to taking them off my face.
customer_reviews.author: S. Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Love the fizzy feel!
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice. The bubbles feel fizzy and I’m surprised at how much foam you get out of this mask. This mask also fits my face much better. Most masks are huge and need to be folded all over to fit my face which leaves pressure lines. This is a decent size which required no origami skills
customer_reviews.author: LAK78

customer_reviews.title: Interesting mask but not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT for sensitive skin. The bubbles were cool and the masks arrived on time, but my face has red spots (not hives) just areas of redness. If you buy and have sensitive skin, you may want to leave it on for a shorter time. I did 10 min based on directions.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest shopper

customer_reviews.title: Mild scent. Excellent bubble masks
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fanatic about bubble masks. I use them 2-3 times a week and this one is really good. Lightly scented (thankfully) smells a little like berries. Lots of fluffy bubbles and my skin looks amazing after. I wouldn’t say this adds any moisture but its not drying in the least. my skin feels comfortable after. I highly recommend these to my over 40 ladies :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sleeeepy

customer_reviews.title: ITS FUN. Bubble up your face .
customer_reviews.text: OMG this is so fun and it work. I wash my face then apply the mask. You got to rub the package before you open it. I leave it on my face for 30 mins a bit longer than the recommendation 15-20 mins. It’s bubbles up a lot hahaha until I had to take it off. Leave skin nice and clean. So far been using it twice a week .
customer_reviews.author: AJT

customer_reviews.title: Deep clean
customer_reviews.text: These masks are great! Ive never tried a bubble mask. I found these are a little smaller than a lot of other masks which is good because theres no folding over and awkwardness. When the bubbles start foaming up you can feel a slight tingling like a good facial. After removing my skin feels soft and extra clean, really cuts down my oil without drying out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZONCUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: the comfort of using this mask is amazing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter sent me a sample to try. she loved it and thought I would to. I did. very relaxing, feels good on the skin, when removed was refreshed and "plumped" wrinkles less noticeable - for at least a day, made me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bubble up!
customer_reviews.text: I use a face mask at least three to four mornings a week. These are by far some of the coolest and most effective. The bubbles are funny and really seemed to do a great cleansing!
customer_reviews.author: ELEN WS

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just for fun. Since the sheet mask, bubbles. It’s fun. I did two masks. Suggested use is twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: The skin feels great and soft after use. It does bubble up quite a bit. Make sure you're laying flat and close your eyes. Great product, I've ordered more of their other masks to try out.
customer_reviews.author: Bagner

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your money
customer_reviews.text: They are good bubble mask, cant compare with the glamglow but they work, clean your skin and give you a pretty glow.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.DianaBP

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean refreshed hydrated feeling love this mask, don’t get it in your eyes it stings 😆
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Goood
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t try it yet but the packing is good. Hope it will works well on my face
customer_reviews.author: Mia T

customer_reviews.title: Make my face smooth afterwards
customer_reviews.text: They have cleared my face . It doesn't make it peel . It actually works :)
customer_reviews.author: lolita

customer_reviews.title: Skin dry after use
customer_reviews.text: I only did one mask & it made my skin dry!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Latshaw

product_meta.title: Ebanel 10 Pack Carbonated Bubble Clay Mask, Deep Cleansing Face Mask for Acne and Pores, Detox Volcanic Ash and Bentonite Clay Mask with Collagen Peptides, Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide
feature_bullets: PORE CLEANSING & DETOXIFYING FACE MASK - Infused with Bentonite Clay, Volcanic Ash, Niacinamide, this bubble mask generates tickly bubbles to deeply cleanse & unclog pores, minimize pore appearance, treat acne, reduce redness, and remove impurities

FOAMING OXYGENATING COLLAGEN FACE MASK - Enhanced with slowly released oxygen gas & Collagen Peptides to help boost skin cell regeneration for a firmer, younger look. Collagen used in this facial mask is extracted from seaweed
INSTANT BRIGHTENING & HYDRATING FACE MASK - Infused with Ascorbic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid and Fruit Extracts for a bright, smooth and luminous complexion
OIL & ALCOHOL FREE, SOAP-FREE - Great for all skin types. Plant-derived & made of biodegradable microfiber that is thicker, softer and fits the face better
FORMULATED IN KOREA & MADE IN USA - This Korean face mask never tested on animals - Cruelty-Free & Vegan-Friendly! cGMP Certified, Hypoallergenic. Rub package before opening for better results

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
